creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: commercially printed Christmas card with small image of Astroboy flying around a dragon carrying two older men at LRQ; long typed message on card
inscription: bottom: [The exhibition was the greatest one!!]; on back: [Ed Robison / 2332 Middlefield Rd / Palo Alto / CA / 94301-4026 / U.S.A]
title: Greeting Cards to H.E. Robison
